modName: Ancient Falmer Crown Headgear Armor Fix
summary: This mods allows the player to use the Ancient Falmer Crown with the rest of the set.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ffff00]This file works as intended and doesn't require support or updates. Feel free to use it how you please, no need for credit me or anything.[/color][/b]

You must have Dawnguard DLC!

This mod adds the Ancient Falmer headpiece / crown / helmet to the Arch-Curate's outfit so that you can loot it and use it. It also turns the crown into a piece of armor with an armor value, and adds the attributes to allow it to benefit from all relevant perks.

[color=#00ffff]In short, it makes the Ancient Falmer set complete.[/color]
author: Cold Harmonics
